{"id_":"1e3baefa-b07e-4530-ae19-84fae88338a1","metadata":{},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{},"hash":"nMsGuHId+ZU/TzPjHBQmnP1sOjJhbXqIbD95my1xiJQ=","text":"

Muhammad Ali
| Islamabad , Pakistan | m.ali8.aj8@gmail.com | GitHub | portfolio-website |
EDUCATION                                                                                                                                                 
National University of Science & Technology 2018 - 2022
BS Electrical Engineering 
GPA: 3.62 / 4.00
Coursework: Intro to Programming , Object Oriented Programming , Data Structures & Algorithms.
PROJECTS                                                                                                                                                   
E-commerce Storewebsite code  
I developed a Next.js e-commerce store, integrating a cart system and Stripe payments seamlessly 
with a Sanity Admin Dashboard. The frontend, powered by Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and React 
Context, leveraged the Sanity SDK with server actions for data fetching.
To ensure real-time updates, I implemented web hooks for data synchronization between 
the admin dashboard and the client-facing store. This allows administrators to effortlessly 
manage inventory, reflecting changes instantly on the storefront.
Social Media Appwebsite code  
I designed and developed a responsive app using React, Tanstack Query, and Tailwind CSS, 
deployed seamlessly via Vercel. The app offers essential functionalities such as creating, reading,
saving, and editing posts, enhancing interaction.
To optimize performance , I used caching and pagination with React Query. Integrated Explore 
functionality, users can search and filter options for posts, dynamically rearranging content based 
on recent activities
Real time Chat appwebsite code  
I conceptualized and developed a real-time chat application independently, crafting a responsive 
front end using React, Tailwind CSS, and Redux Toolkit. Using selectors I ensured minimal re- 
renders while enabling core features.
Using socket-io events on client & server , I implemented real-time messaging & notifications. 
I engineered a robust REST API with JavaScript Web Tokens (JWT) for authentication and Prisma
ORM for schema and queries. Deployed on Amazon EC2 with Nginx Load Balancer.
EXPERIENCE                                                                                                                                               
Freelance Developer ( MERN Stack , DevOps ) 2023 - Present
Designed & developed full stack apps for outsourcing agencies , collaborating with teams to 
deliver key features for various SaaS products.
Research Engineer ( Applied Cryptography )     2022 - 2023
Contributed to IoT blockchain patent research, focusing on Consensus Algorithm and DAG 
structural design. Conducted scalability and security simulations. 
Contributed research to wireless secret exchange protocol utilizing zero knowledge proofs for 
lightweight peer-to-peer secret exchange.
SKILLS                                                                                                                                                         
Languages: JavaScript , Typescript , HTML , CSS , Bash , C++ 
Development: React , Next.js , Redux , Node , Prisma ORM , Web Sockets 
Design: Tailwind CSS , Shadcn UI , Framer-motion , Figma , Canva.
Other : Git , GitHub , Postman , REST API , OOP , Data Structures","textTemplate":"","metadataSeparator":"
","type":"DOCUMENT"}
